tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
quoteDoc: Terms of Service and Honor Code
quoteText: Although these items are collected by edX in accordance with these TOS and the Privacy Policy, you should be aware that the actual authentication of your identity is performed by an edX third-party service provider and this information will be used only for the purpose of verifying your identity.
